page.title: 06LOCHFOOT GALA
page.content: IN 1964,MR HOLLIDAY THE VILLAGE HEADTEACHER,ORGANISED THE FIRST LOCHFOOT GALA,WHICH HAS SINCE BECOME A LOCAL CUSTOM.IN FEBRUARY THE GALA COMMITTEE MEET.IN MARCH THE GALA QUEEN,HER ATTENDANTS,THE HERALD AND PAGE ARE CHOSEN FROM THE PRIMARY SCHOOL PUPILS.IN MAY A SPONSORED WALK RAISES FUNDS FOR THE FESTIVITIES.ON THE DAYS LEADING UP TO THE GALA DAY EVENTS SUCH AS PARTIES,DISCOS, WHIST AND DARTS NIGHTS ARE HELD.THE CROWNING CEREMONY IS ON THE FRIDAY NIGHT AND IS FOLLOWED BY A CONCERT.USUALLY ON THE SATURDAY,GALA DAY,THERE HAS BEEN A FANCY DRESS PARADE,SPORTS AND SIDESTALLS IN THE PLAYING FIELD BUT THIS YEAR,1985,EVERYONE IS GOING TO BUTLIN'S HOLIDAY CAMP AT AYR.THE KIRKIN' O' THE QUEEN IS ON THE SUNDAY. IN AUGUST THE HORTICULTURAL SHOW IS HELD AND LATER THE OLD FOLK'S DINNER.
